maple: B[1]:= X -> X^2:for n from 2 to 50 do B[n]:= unapply(expand(X^2*(B[n-1](X+1)-B[n-1](X))), X) od:seq(D(B[n])(1),n=1..50); # _Robert Israel_, Apr 21 2016
